name: nodejs_server
description: This Node.js server class, named NodeServer, provides a flexible and extensible solution for serving static files. It supports both callback and event-driven approaches for handling HTTP requests. The class allows dynamic configuration of the server's port, startup method, and a base file to serve when the root URL is accessed. It incorporates error handling, preventing the server from attempting to read a favicon.ico file and responding with a generic 500 Internal Server Error in case of file read errors. The code is well-documented, follows best practices, and includes event-driven logging for easy integration into other applications.
author: Imoleayo Moses
